channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'P' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'P' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Portable App?
item.description: A portable app is a software program that can be run from a removable storage device, such as a USB flash drive, without the need for installation or setup on the host computer.

item.title: What is a Portable Application?
item.description: A portable application is a software program that is designed to be easily transferred from one computer to another and run on any compatible device without the need for installation or setup.

item.title: What is a Portable Software?
item.description: Portable software, also known as a portable application or a portable app, is a type of software that is designed to be easily transferred from one device to another and run without the need for installation.

item.title: What is PostScript?
item.description: PostScript is a programming language and page description language used mainly in the printing and desktop publishing industries.

item.title: What is a Page Layout?
item.description: Page layout refers to the organization and formatting of elements on a page, such as text, images, and other media, in a way that is aesthetically pleasing and consistent.

item.title: What is a Permalink?
item.description: A permalink, short for “permanent link,” is a URL (Uniform Resource Locator) that is intended to remain unchanged for the lifetime of the content to which it refers.

item.title: What is Parity Check?
item.description: “Parity check” is a method of checking the accuracy of data transmission or storage.

item.title: What is a Product Key?
item.description: A product key, also known as a license key or activation key, is a unique alphanumeric code that is required to install and activate a software application.
